TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant and his wife obtained a divorce decree . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant ’s ex - wife filed with ORG ( Sąd Rejonowy ) a petition for division of the matrimonial property .
On DATE ORG gave a decision . Both parties appealed . On DATE ORG ( PERSON ) quashed the first - instance decision and remitted the case .
In DATE the applicant ’s ex - wife donated her share in the disputed property to ORG and ORG , who became parties to the proceedings .

On DATE the applicant sent a letter to the Minister of ORG , complaining about the slow progress of the proceedings . On DATE , in reply to his complaints , the President of ORG acknowledged that the proceedings were indeed lengthy .
Prior to CARDINAL DATE , ORG held a number of hearings and obtained several expert reports .

On DATE the ORG gave a decision . The court granted ownership of the entire property ( plot of land and a house ) to PERSON and PERSON The court also ordered them to pay off the applicant ’s share in the estate .
On DATE , on the applicant ’s appeal , ORG partly amended the first - instance decision . On DATE the applicant lodged a cassation appeal .
In DATE PERSON and ORG sold their share in the property to a certain PERSON On DATE ORG ( Sąd Najwyższy ) quashed the decision of CARDINAL June DATE and remitted the case to ORG ( PERSON ) .
On DATE ORG issued an interim order allowing the applicant to install central heating in his part of the house . On DATE , upon an appeal by PERSON , ORG quashed this decision .
It appears that the proceedings are pending before ORG .
